title: Levels dropped
body: So not only did my aram xp not get added, now 3 days worth of games xp have been taken from me and i dropped from level 26 to level 22. What the hell man?

replies.body: iv had the same issue man been stuck at level 25 for around 3 days now wont let me level up at all

yeah they really finished off the year and the ranked seasons a complete and utter mess. they announce 50 different games and updates at the piss weak 10th anniversary stream, they give out the stingiest rewards. and then they cant even get the original game correct in 10 years. so many people are moving away from LoL, a few come back only when URF gets announced, that's about it. the exp problem has been happening for about a week now and still nothing has been acknowledged or announced. then they give out some shitty worlds icon when worlds is already over. lol get over the icons riot, they are useless and do not provide a single thing at all, they never have and never will. make something decent in the game instead of making everyone waste all their points on runes that u then got rid of and fucked everyone over. once u own all the champions, blue essence essentially does nothing, yet u continue to put champion chards inside chests, which are useless when u already own all the champs. people do not bother with missions etc that give blue essence, because u cant buy anything with it, its a pointless currency for end game players.
